column4: Is there a way to see a list of packages that are installed but sorted by size?
I don't know how to sort by size. I just know you could dpkg --get-selections > my-pkg-list
Then you should see a file called my-pkg-list and just gedit it (or open it or what not) and it will have all installed packages in it...
You could sort afterwards if you export the file to a program of choice
